title: Up and running with LINQ
eventShortDescription: ​Linq is the future of ORM on the .NET platform and with the release of Visual Studio 2013 only months away it will become mainstream. In this presentation you will learn about the different types of LINQ and how to use LINQ to quickly build data-driven applications.
eventDescription: ​Linq is the future of ORM on the .NET platform and with the release of Visual Studio 2013 only months away it will become mainstream. In this presentation you will learn about the different types of LINQ and how to use LINQ to quickly build data-driven applications.
